summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a proposed meeting in Beijing. The email includes details about the meeting time and location, as well as a confidentiality notice regarding the communication.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and is checking his schedule with the Asia team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email and is involved in scheduling a meeting.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are coordinating a meeting, indicating a professional relationship.

events.title: Proposed Meeting in Beijing
events.description: A meeting is proposed to take place at The St Regis Hotel in Beijing.

keyFacts: The email discusses a proposed meeting between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein.
The meeting is suggested for September 2, 2010, at The St Regis Hotel in Beijing.
The communication contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
